question.title: What is a characteristic of typical articular or periarticular microcrystalline attacks?

option_a.title: The pain is usually mild and lasts for several weeks

option_b.title: The maximum symptoms occur within 24-48 hours

option_c.title: The pain is usually intense and lasts for several days

option_d.title: The pain is usually localized to the foot and base of the big toe

correct_option.title: C
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
